title: 114_hr6484
content: Commission to Study Family Reconstruction Proposals for African-Americans Unjustly Impacted by the quot, War on Drugsquot. Act of 2016 This bill establishes a commission to examine and report on: the disparate incarceration and the institution of forced prison labor within the African-American community, government and private sector support for and profit from mass incarceration, discriminatory laws and other forms of discrimination in the public and private sectors, and the lingering negative effects of mass incarceration. The commission must make recommendations for education and remedies.
